nodes.text: Imperial Domination was a propaganda poster created by the Galactic Empire. The poster depicted a red background with Darth Vader raising his arm up with his hand clawed, four TIE Fighters and one TIE Interceptor flying in formation, as well as the Death Star in the background, with the name of the poster listed in the bottom with a diamond showing an Imperial-class Star Destroyer. When a group of Rebels stole an Imperial shuttle, they discovered the poster design and used it for their own purposes without altering it, emphasizing the poster's threat.
